703045f-a.text:
Atlantic Ave., north side, between Classon and Grand Aves.  In the foreground is seen the Fairchild Mortuary.

November 26, 1927.
P.L. Sperr.
703045f-a.folder: Atlantic Avenue & Classon Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

P. L. Sperr     September 14, 1941
